website_summaries.verdict: A simple, chic bag for school or the gym.
pros: This minimal bag is great for students without too many textbooks, or gym goers that only need a bag for clothes
There are two side pockets and a sleeve for a laptop 15 inches or smaller
cons: Thin material, may not support a heavy load

customer_reviews.title: Actual photos of backup
customer_reviews.text: Decided to add some photos since there wasn't any anywhere....? It's a simple basic backpack from Nike. Just a few pockets. Size is Basic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nike Heritage Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Quick shipping. Standard size backpack, I don't know why other people complain that it's small. Affordable. Plenty of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. Specially the color black. It looks very stylish. I use it for school & the gym. It’s very spacious inside & holds laptop, small items on the sides as well. Im big fan of Nike so this backpack is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very small backpack - not for middle school or high school
customer_reviews.text: Great look, very small. Not for older kids with a lot of this to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Another great Nike product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! I use it for traveling and it’s perfect! There is a pocket in the back of the backpack to store your laptop. The color is grey and the anime Swoosh is mint green. The backpack was able to carry 3 large textbooks, 2 five subject notebooks, a 1.5 inch binder PLUS my 15in MacBook Pro. The only thing I’m not thrilled with is that the pocket for the laptop is not padded. Not enough for me to deduct a star though. I love this backpack and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: The Jazz Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Not white logo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was white nike on the front and it’s actually mint colored. Nothing wrong with backpack but was expecting a white logo
customer_reviews.author: amanda mcneill

customer_reviews.title: very CUTE.
customer_reviews.text: Im a college student and was looking for something cute but comfy and this is perfect. Only problem I didn’t like was how thin it was. If it was to get wet it would seek through and most likely wet my laptop. Overall I love it and can’t wait to use it next semester.
customer_reviews.author: marielle.

customer_reviews.title: Last for years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack a few years ago and it’s still holding up. It’s durable, simple, and looks nice. I’m a college student, so I needed a light bag that would carry my laptop, notebooks, and whatever books I needed and this bag does just that. I am happy with the purchase and plan to use it the rest of my college life. However, it should be mentioned that this bag is not meant for students/people who carry many heavy things.
customer_reviews.author: Lul S.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size for travel...dark color works well with showing no dirt, its very lightweight and it's comfortable to wear -- even when loaded up with "stuff"! For me it's the perfect size. It's not huge, but we took it traveling and it worked out great on the plane and our daily adventures.
customer_reviews.author: MarieAC

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far.
customer_reviews.text: Like this product except it looks like on the front there's some fuzzy like material on it. Like maybe it's wearing quickly but I will keep an eye on it & send it bk if it gets worse. My 14 yr old son really likes it. So that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best looking basic
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice looking basic backpack. Just what I wanted. Its just as pictured. Shoulder straps are nice and wide which makes it comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!! Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for price! I’m a personal trainer and it’s perfect for work, very simple and sporty! I would definitely recommend and by again!!
customer_reviews.author: alexande

customer_reviews.title: I Love the size
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack, it’s the perfect size, for work. It’s lightweight. Its not large but I can pack a lot of items in it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: best backpack for school
customer_reviews.text: Hello i'd like to say that I've been using this unisex backpack for almost 3 months now and let me just say that i really love this backpack easy, lightweight, and good looking too. This bag is a keeper and a must have
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and roomy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5th grader. Perfect room!!! He could fit his 3” 3 ring binder with no hassle and extra room to fit more of his school belongings!!! It’s held up pretty great too!!!
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: If you order a gray one the Nike sign is actually turquoise not white
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nike Heritage Backpack
customer_reviews.text: ii brought this backpack for my son in 11th grade and he loves it. It is true to the color and size.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My middle schooler had one already and is using it for a 2nd year in a roll. Bought for my 2nd son. Durable and roomy and not uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Zipper problems
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this recently for our son for school. The first day he had it he put his snacks in the front pocket zipped it up and that is where they stayed. We tried many different methods of trying to open the zipper and no success. I had to eventually split the zipper to get into the pocket to remove his snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and style. The size is perfect for my 2nd grader! It’s not too big but it’s normal size so not too small. I love the neutral color and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie-Blair August

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Backpack for the School year and it still looks Brand New 6 months Later.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, yet simple.
customer_reviews.text: Inside pocket for laptop, two side pockets, and front pocket! Larger than anticipated, works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kate C auger

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for school. Now, he's the envy of all his classmates!
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Aagaard

customer_reviews.title: Best bookbag hands down
customer_reviews.text: My son's love these bookbags. I bought these midyear after going through two other bookbags for each of them and this one held up the remaining school year. My oldest is taking it to college.
customer_reviews.author: Rick76

customer_reviews.title: Nike Heritage Backpack
customer_reviews.text: The NIke Heritage Backpack was just the right size and had an easy-to close zipper which is exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It does not bulge into my back like some do. It keeps its shape. Also cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth W. Southern

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11/12 yr old it held up well
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Kee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag served it’s purpose for holding my belongings and my laptop for work. The picture of the bag looks like a more water proof material.
customer_reviews.author: CMandiB

customer_reviews.title: Material
customer_reviews.text: The material looks and feels different than the one in the photo and kind of looks like someone just printed the Nike Label in the backpack. But it’s still cute and just the right size. We’ll see how it holds up this year
customer_reviews.author: Leon Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you will like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome book bag, made well and the best price
customer_reviews.author: KrisTina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. I got it for college and don't think I will go back to having anything else! Very roomy and can cary a lot comfortably!
customer_reviews.author: Alayne Isom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome good deal😊
customer_reviews.text: Awesome nice😊just like the pic my son going to love it
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price and the exact size I was looking for. My son (junior in high school) was thrilled to get this.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Rose Axiak

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got so many compliments on this backpack. Kohls has similar backpacks for a cheaper price
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Michel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable sleek and great size for my teenager. She is a crammer! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Shawndy

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My kids can go through some book bags, but this one has held up. Has a good amount of space for my high schooler. She likes the straps and the room it has. Great back pack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! Bought for my son for school and he LOVES it as well! Durable and just the right size. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: kilenew224

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a woman
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily walking around San Francisco for going to workouts, running errands, and even traveling for the weekend. It's simple, clean design and the perfect size for a woman. I'm 5' 3. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ct

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: very simple, good quality, not to big or bulky, fits plenty!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Got two for my boys. They loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My freshman boy got this backpack, great price and product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nike,Just Do It! Right size,right price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6th grade son! Durable an light weight! Plenty of space! Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Case

customer_reviews.title: Big and roomy but good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Only issue is that it is slightly larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Loni U

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweight back pack
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple not too heavy bag. I can see using this often.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack
customer_reviews.text: My son have this bag for back to school he loves it good bag
customer_reviews.author: cytherea Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and great backpack
customer_reviews.text: We got a great deal on this backpack during the back to school sale. A little bug for a 5 year old but he can grow in to it.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Straps feel strong, and color looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This was a first time I ever purchased a backpack before actually seeing it in person! To my surprise the picture matched the backpack spot on! It looks great, feels great! And was delivered quickly as well!
customer_reviews.author: DisopaJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time , appears to be of good quality. Got it as a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bookbag for
customer_reviews.text: Great bookbag. If enough to carry almost everything I need at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is super cute I originally bought it for myself but my sister loved it so much so I let her have it! Great backpack and comfortable on the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: skylar

customer_reviews.title: Trendy , good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a Valentine’s Day gift for my boyfriend and he looooved it!!! It’s a great backpack very proportionate not too big or small. It’s very stylish as well. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: On the small side
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is but it’s a little on the small side for a middle school or high school kid
customer_reviews.author: Josh Pesina

customer_reviews.title: Good product great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack for my nephew as a back to school item. He wanted a Nike backpack. Great quality good price and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Awful return policy
customer_reviews.text: Awful return policy, 20% restocking fee plus pay for shipping. Either buy from someone else or be absolutely certain this is the one. Inside pocket is too small, I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: kevin kruk

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but too small
customer_reviews.text: It was good buy, but the size was small.for whst my daughter needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Mira

customer_reviews.title: Can be worn by kids & adults.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my 6 year old son who’s going into grade 1. It’s the perfect size. It can fit all 9 text books and writing books and the material is very durable. I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pommells

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the zippers
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with the purchase originally. Third week of my child using it, the front pocket zipper broke. The window to return ended on 9/12😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture and description
customer_reviews.text: In the description it says teal but in the picture it is white. Not happy. Not what i wanted. Nice backpack but not what i expected.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my laptop and books. All the pockets are convenient. Overall great, laptop sized backpack for school.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyan

customer_reviews.title: Hello
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way the backpack is designed but I honestly dislike the teal checkmark...makes it look a bit girly
customer_reviews.author: suil

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son was looking for at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tmidd2674

customer_reviews.title: Practical Gym/Commuter bag
customer_reviews.text: Very practical, small backpack with 1 inner laptop fold, above average storage in front pocket and two small pockets on the sides with zippers. Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Its cute I use it for school, it is a good durable backpack and cute
customer_reviews.author: nicci

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple design, good size. I use it as a gym backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jiravska

customer_reviews.title: good size, comfy
customer_reviews.text: medium size, perfect for a few note books and a laptop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: weight i have back pain and issues
customer_reviews.text: it wasnt as heavy i didnt feel much comfort but family and friends did
customer_reviews.author: Cherry-Ann Constantine-Letren

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke within only a few short months and the material was very cheap. Not durable and very disappointed. Had much higher expectations of a Nike laptop bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a plane was really good for carry on

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable even with heavy stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied! inside pocket helps a lot with like laptop. Side pockets are perfect size.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my little first grader, he and I both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Escutia

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a sturdy product. Not quite as big as we'd hoped but it works. Wish it had the chest strap. Overall good purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My son said it was the best back pack ever!

customer_reviews.title: Its a back pack....
customer_reviews.text: My son bought it because it has the check on it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Lovely Back Pack. Perfect Size. Love the side pockets !!!

customer_reviews.title: It's not leather....lol
customer_reviews.text: I love the depth and I appreciate the side 2 pockets( it comes in handy.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Usually a month into school my now 7yr old needs his backpack replaced, here we are 3 months in and his backpack is holding strong!

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it !! Its exactly what i was looking for !!

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Arrive quickly and as advertised. The price was right and it's serving it's purpose.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great and sturdy backpack. My daughter loves it and says it’s comfortable. It’s a nice size bag.

customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. And plenty of padding inside to protect your valuables

customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke 3 days after the last day I could have returned it. Not happy!

customer_reviews.text: Durable , the straps are super supportive to the back I love it .

product_meta.title: Nike Heritage Backpack
product_meta.description: NIKE Heritage Backpack combines simplicity and functionality with its compartmentalization and clean design. Padded shoulder straps add an element of comfort while you carry your gear.
feature_bullets: - Densely woven polyester provides heavyweight support.
- Zippered main compartment offers room for your gear.
- Zippered front pouch provides small-item storage.
- Shoulder straps and back panel are padded for comfortable carrying.
